This easy to use application allows you to keep track of your golf score. It also allows you to measure the distance you hit the golf ball using GPS.

Simply tap the “New Game” button and take a picture of the golf scorecard issued by the golf club. To input scores, first tap and hold at the required position in the screen to create a text box. When the text box appear, you can proceed to fill it with your score.

Another advanced feature provided is template creation. You can take a picture of the tee off box and mark out where you should aim, highlight bunker distance, etc. Multiple pictures and notes can be taken for each hole, and linked to the template. Take a picture with your friends when you hit a hole in one, and store it in the template for memory sake.

The next time you play the same golf course, you can link your scorecard to the template and review the notes taken previously.
